title: Managing Your Money: Bitcoin Versus Gold
description: Is Bitcoin inflation-proof "digital gold" or more of a speculative tech bet? Barron's crypto editor Daren Fonda dives into the debate with Matthew McLennan, co-head of global value at First Eagle Investments.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: Is Bitcoin inflation-proof "digital gold" or more of a speculative tech bet? Barron's crypto editor Daren Fonda dives into the debate with Matthew McLennan, co-head of global value at First Eagle Investments.
